allow: Bash("C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS call_logs_db CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;")
Bash("C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root call_logs_db -e "SELECT id, name, email, role, status, created_at FROM users WHERE email = ''user@example.com'';")
Bash("C:\wamp64\bin\mysql\mysql9.1.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root call_logs_db -e "SELECT id, email, password, created_at FROM admins WHERE email = ''superadmin@office.com'';")
